title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item in library outline view
description: Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the selection does not register at the first attempt.
OB: Observed Behavior: The first attempt to select any item in the library outline view does not result in the item being selected.
EB: Expected Behavior: Upon the first attempt, the selected item should be highlighted and remain selected.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce: 
1. Add a label to a library file. 
2. Open the library outline view. 
3. Attempt to select the label item. 
4. Observe that the label item is not selected. 
5. Repeat step 3, and notice that the label item is now selected as expected.
